terms.title: Booking Conditions
terms.intro: These Booking Conditions regulate the contracting of services offered by Dolovibes S de RL, operating as Dolo Vibes.
terms.acceptance: By making a reservation, the client accepts these conditions.
terms.questionsDesc: If you have questions about our booking conditions, don't hesitate to contact us.

cancellation.title: Cancellation and Refund Policy
cancellation.intro: Cancellation policies vary depending on the package and providers involved, as we work with hotels, refuges, and local guides that have their own policies.
cancellation.moreThan45: Cancellations more than 45 days before the trip starts:
cancellation.moreThan45Desc: Partial refund, deducting administrative costs and already booked services.
cancellation.lessThan45: Cancellations less than 45 days before the trip:
cancellation.nonRefundable: Some services may be 100% non-refundable from the moment of booking, especially during high season or for specific accommodations.
cancellation.companyTitle: Cancellations or changes by the Company
cancellation.companyIntro: The Company may modify or cancel the itinerary due to:
cancellation.clientOptions: In these cases, the client may choose to:
options: Receive credit for a future trip
Partial or full refund, depending on costs already committed to providers
cancellation.noShowDesc: If the client does not show up at the agreed place and date, it will be considered a late cancellation and there will be no right to a refund.
cancellation.refundsDesc: Refunds, when applicable, will be made through the same payment method used, within a period of 15 to 30 business days, depending on the payment platform.
cancellation.importantNoteDesc: The specific policies of each package are detailed during the booking process and are part of the Booking Conditions accepted by the client when contracting.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.intro: This website uses cookies to improve the user experience.
cookies.whatDesc: Cookies are small files that are stored on your device when you visit a website and allow your browser to be recognized.
cookies.necessaryDesc: Enable basic site functionality, such as access to secure areas and the booking process.
cookies.analyticsDesc: Help us understand how users interact with the site to improve our services (e.g., Google Analytics).
cookies.marketingDesc: Used to display relevant advertising on external platforms.
cookies.managementDesc1: The user can accept, reject or configure the use of cookies from the cookie banner when entering the site.
cookies.managementDesc2: You can also delete cookies from your browser settings.
cookies.changesDesc: This policy may be updated at any time. Changes will be published on this page.
